name: Eye-Laser Savings Calculator by Ostheimer
author: Ostheimer.at

sections.description:
You must enter your current age and the estimated amounts that say how much you spend per year for eyeglasses, sunglasses, and / or contact lenses and care products.

Shortcode

  • You can add the Eye-Laser Savings Calculator via shortcode [eyelaser_savings]
  • Please help us by activating our backlink and use the shortcode [eyelaser_savings link=”true”]

Try the demo

See the Eye-Laser Savings Calculator site for a test run!
sections.installation:
1. Upload “eyelaser-savings” folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the Eye-Laser Savings Calculator using the short tag [eyelaser_savings]
sections.faq:
How can I display the Eye-Laser Savings Calculator on the Frontend?

You can add the shortcode [eyelaser_savings] in a post or page so that the Eye-Laser Savings Calculator will be diplayed in that page.

How can I change the costs for laser eye treatments?

  1. Open eyelaser-savings.js
  2. Go to line 66 and change the variable “lasercosts”
  3. Save and upload the file
